question: Which country has signed a bill that proposes to impose sanctions on officials targeting pro-democracy supporters in Hong Kong?
explanation: US President Donald Trump signed a bill that supports pro-democracy protesters in Hong Kong, a move that is bound to anger China. The legislation proposes to impose sanctions on officials committing human rights violations against pro-democracy supporters in Hong Kong. It was passed by both the chambers of the US Congress House of Representatives (417-1) and the Senate unanimously.
